hero.title: Own the Future of Digital Freedom
hero.subtitle: A premium domain crafted for the next era of online education, coaching, and digital empowerment — ready for your vision.

legacy.title: Built with Intention. Ready for Its Next Chapter.
legacy.p1: Liberté Digitale was born in early 2025 with a clear mission: to build a <highlight>digital platform for freedom</highlight> — freedom to learn, to teach, and to grow without boundaries.
legacy.p2: Over 18 months of dedicated development, we crafted a brand identity, secured premium social handles, and laid the foundation for a platform that resonates with the growing demand for online education and coaching.
legacy.p3: As the founding team pivots toward a new venture, this carefully built digital asset is now available for acquisition — giving you a <highlight>head start that money alone can't buy</highlight>.

asset.title: Why This Domain?
asset.subtitle: A rare combination of meaning, memorability, and market timing.

cards.title: SEO Power
cards.text: A clean, keyword-rich domain that signals authority in the digital education and freedom-tech space. Zero spam history, ready for indexing.

cards.title: Brandability
cards.text: "Liberté Digitale" evokes trust, aspiration, and modernity. It's memorable, cross-lingual, and built for a global audience.

cards.title: Market Fit
cards.text: The e-learning market is projected to exceed $400B by 2027. This domain is positioned squarely at the intersection of education and digital empowerment.

metrics.title: SEO & Acquisition Metrics
metrics.subtitle: Data-driven proof of potential. This domain is already positioned to capture valuable traffic.
metrics.source: Data source: Ubersuggest / Google Ads Keyword Planner.

cards.label: Monthly Search Volume
cards.description: Targeting high-value clusters around 'Liberté' + 'Digitale' and related freedom-tech keywords.

cards.label: Commercial Intent (CPC)
cards.description: Strong advertiser competition indicates high commercial value in this niche.

cards.label: Market Value
cards.description: Qualified traffic from the French-speaking digital economy and global nomads.

package.title: Everything You Need to Launch
package.subtitle: This isn't just a domain — it's a complete brand foundation.

items.title: Premium Domain
items.text: LiberteDigitale.com — clean history, zero penalties, ready for instant deployment.

items.title: Premium Branding
items.text: LibertéDigitale.com is a high-recall, phonetically balanced name that commands authority in the French-speaking and international e-(learning/commerce) markets.

items.title: Market Positioning
items.text: Perfectly positioned for the $300B+ E-learning and EdTech sectors. The keywords 'Liberté' and 'Digitale' tap into the most searched aspirations in the modern economy.

items.title: Instant Authority
items.text: Skip the 'new brand' friction. This domain provides the instant trust required to convert high-ticket clients and serious entrepreneurs from day one.

profiles.title: Who Is This Domain For?
profiles.subtitle: Built for visionaries who understand that the right name changes everything.

cards.title: E-Learning Platforms
cards.text: The name "Liberté Digitale" speaks directly to digital freedom through education — perfect positioning for course platforms, LMS providers, and EdTech startups.

cards.title: Online Coaches & Consultants
cards.text: A premium, aspirational brand name that instantly communicates transformation and empowerment — exactly what coaching clients seek.

cards.title: Digital Agencies
cards.text: For agencies focused on digital transformation, this domain conveys innovation, independence, and a forward-thinking philosophy.

cards.title: Startup Brands
cards.text: A unique, cross-lingual name that stands out in crowded markets. Perfect for any startup building at the intersection of technology and personal growth.
